messages.content: What is the purpose of ComfyUI-Nich-Utils?
ComfyUI-Nich-Utils is a set of utilities for ComfyUI that provide additional functionality such as regular expression filtering, keeping the current image, persisting to workflow JSON, and more.
In which version was the node to select text portions by regular expression added?
The node to select text portions by regular expression was added in version 0.0.6 of ComfyUI-Nich-Utils.
How does version 0.0.5 handle the case of keeping the current image without an image?
In version 0.0.5, if the user attempts to keep the current image without an image loaded, ComfyUI-Nich-Utils will load a specific image instead of crashing.
What changes were made in version 0.0.4?
In version 0.0.4 of ComfyUI-Nich-Utils, the filename with and without extension was exposed, and Comfy's image loading logic was followed.
How was the 'Keep current' feature improved in version 0.0.3?
In version 0.0.3, the 'Keep current' feature was improved so that it no longer reloads the image when activated. However, it still reloads the image when switching from False to True.
What was added in version 0.0.2 of ComfyUI-Nich-Utils?
Subdirectory traversal was added in version 0.0.2 of ComfyUI-Nich-Utils.
What features were included in the initial setup of ComfyUI-Nich-Utils?
The initial setup of ComfyUI-Nich-Utils in version 0.0.1 included regular expression filtering, keeping the current image, and persisting to workflow JSON.
What does the 'Image from Dir Selector' node in Nich Comfy Utils allow for?
The 'Image from Dir Selector' node allows for selecting a random image from a provided folder, pinning a single image, searching within subdirectories, and filtering using a regular expression.
How can the 'Image from Dir Selector' node be used to select specific files only?
The 'Image from Dir Selector' node can select specific files only by using the optional regular expression filtering feature.
What is one example use case for the 'Image from Dir Selector' node?
One example use case for the 'Image from Dir Selector' node is selecting a random image for IPadapter.
What does the 'Select Text with Regular Expression' node in Nich Comfy Utils allow for?
The 'Select Text with Regular Expression' node allows for selecting parts of text using a regular expression with a delimiter (default is whitespace).
What is one example use case for the 'Select Text with Regular Expression' node?
One example use case for the 'Select Text with Regular Expression' node is selecting a subset of a prompt.
What are some open work items for Nich Comfy Utils?
Some open work items for Nich Comfy Utils include improving the code, adding tests, and adding more nodes.
What is the current state of development for Nich Comfy Utils?
Nich Comfy Utils is currently in early development and may contain bugs or oddities.
